lines.text: [Charlie's neighbor tells him she doesn't care her husband may have an affair, which Charlie knows is with his wife]
It's just human nature to want a little revenge.
Oh, I get my revenge in little waves. I erase his favorite videos. It drives him crazy.

[laughs]
Well, there's revenge... and there's revenge. Now I know if that were me...

[leaning close to him]
What shall I do? Have an affair of my own? Now where would I find the energy? Besides, who in the whole world would want to run around with someone like me?
[an almost nude Ray has second thoughts about impregnating his cousin's wife as well as covering up her affair with her neighbor]
No, look, I'm sorry, this is not - not good. I've gotta tell Charlie. Make a clean breast of it.
You tell Charlie, I tell Dorothy.
[Ray takes his pants off in defeat]
[after Ray grabs Linda surprisingly to the floor in her neighbors' yard and has anal sex with her - before the female neighbor walks in on them]

[once the neighbor goes away]
I hope I didn't embarrass you.
